docs.text: Flight certification tests A booking of a roundtrip flight of 2 adults A booking of a roundtrip flight of 2 adults and 1 baby A booking of a roundtrip flight of 2 adults and 2 children of 5 and 15 years old each A booking of a roundtrip flight with an extra stop. For instance, Palma de Mallorca - Cancun A booking of a one-way flight of 2 adults in business class A booking of a roundtrip flight of 1 adult with resident discount. For instance, Palma de Mallorca – Madrid A booking of a charter flight of 2 adults with a generated ticket (FlightTicketing method)
